bonus.en: (3) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Evasion ability by -1 min.

bonus.en: (4) Set: Your Backstab, Sinister Strike, and Hemorrhage critical hits cause you to regain 5 energy.

bonus.en: (8) Set: Your Eviscerate has a chance per combo point to reveal a flaw in your opponent's armor, granting a 100% critical hit chance for your next Backstab, Sinister Strike, or Hemorrhage.
bonus.zh: (8) 套装：你的剔骨技能有一定几率找到敌人护甲上的破绽，使你的下一次背刺、邪恶攻击或出血技能必定造成爆击。连击点数越多，找到破绽的几率越大。

bonus.en: (3) Set: Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 18.
bonus.zh: (3) 套装：提高所有法术和魔法效果所造成的伤害和治疗效果，最多18点。

bonus.en: (5) Set: Decreases the magical resistances of your spell targets by 10.
bonus.zh: (5) 套装：使你的法术目标的魔法抗性降低10点。

bonus.en: (8) Set: Decreases the threat generated by your spells by 15%.
bonus.zh: (8) 套装：使你的法术所造成的威胁值减少15%。

bonus.en: (3) Set: Reduces the threat generated by your Scorch, Arcane Missiles, and Frostbolt spells.
bonus.zh: (3) 套装：使你的灼烧、奥术飞弹、火球术和寒冰箭所造成的威胁值降低。

bonus.en: (5) Set: Increases the radius of Arcane Explosion, Flamestrike, and Blizzard by 25%.
bonus.zh: (5) 套装：使魔爆术、烈焰风暴和暴风雪的攻击范围增加25%。

bonus.en: (8) Set: 10% chance after casting Arcane Missiles, Fireball, or Frostbolt that your next spell with a casting time under 10 seconds cast instantly.
bonus.zh: (8) 套装：在你施放奥术飞弹、火球术或寒冰箭之后，有10%的几率使你的下一个施法时间少于10秒的法术变成瞬发。

bonus.en: (3) Set: Your Blizzard spell has a 30% chance to be uninterruptible.
bonus.zh: (3) 套装：你的暴风雪法术有30%的几率完全不被打断。

bonus.en: (5) Set: Grants +5% increased spell hit chance for 20 sec when one of your spells is resisted.
bonus.zh: (5) 套装：当你的法术被抵抗后，法术命中率提高5%，持续20秒。

bonus.en: (2) Set: Reduces the cooldown on your Evocation by 1 minute.
bonus.zh: (2) 套装：使你的唤醒法术的冷却时间减少1分钟。

bonus.en: (4) Set: Gives your Mage Armor a chance when struck by a harmful spell to increase resistance against that school of magic by 35 for 30 sec.
bonus.zh: (4) 套装：使你的魔甲术得到增强，有一定几率在受到伤害性法术攻击之后，对该系法术的抗性提高35点，持续30秒。

bonus.en: (6) Set: Your damage spells have a chance to cause your target to take up to 200 increased damage from subsequent spells.
bonus.zh: (6) 套装：你的伤害法术有一定几率引发更强大的元素能量，使后续的法术对你的目标所造成的伤害提高最多200点。

bonus.en: (8) Set: Your damage spells have a chance to displace you, causing the next spell cast to generate no threat.
bonus.zh: (8) 套装：你的伤害性法术有一定几率令你移位，使你所施放的下一个法术不造成任何威胁值。

bonus.en: (2) Set : 5% chance of dealing 15 to 25 Nature damage on a successful melee attack.
bonus.zh: (2) 套装：有5%的几率在成功击中目标时对其造成15到26点自然伤害。

bonus.en: (3) Set : 2% chance on melee attack of restoring 30 energy.
bonus.zh: (3) 套装：有2%的几率在进行近战攻击时回复30点能量值。

bonus.en: (4) Set : +14 Attack Power.
bonus.zh: (4) 套装：+14 攻击强度。

bonus.en: (2) Set: 5 Stamina
(3) Set: Improves your chance to get a critical strike by 1%.
bonus.zh: (3) 套装：使你造成爆击的几率提高1%。

bonus.en: (2) Set: 5 Stamina
(3) Set: Improves your chance to get a critical strike by 1%.
bonus.zh: (3) 套装：使你造成爆击的几率提高1%。

bonus.en: (3) Set: Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 23.
bonus.zh: (3) 套装：提高所有法术和魔法效果所造成的伤害和治疗效果，最多23点。

bonus.en: (5) Set: Your pet gains 20 stamina and 130 spell resistance against all schools of magic.
bonus.zh: (5) 套装：你的宠物获得20点耐力，对所有魔法的抗性提高130点。

bonus.en: (8) Set: Reduces the threat generated by your Destruction spells by 20%.
bonus.zh: (8) 套装：使你的毁灭系法术所造成的威胁值减少20%。
